review:
the items are good according to the pictures, but the back of the naling tires are exchanged and I think the goods are damaged

hopefully in the future can more carefully check the goods to avoid problems and not be condemned as a seller who is not recommended by disappointed buyers
kenapa kotak yang warna merah kosong pak ,? isinya kok ga ada ? tolong konfurmasinya ya pak . selebihnya barang ok

1st flight ok, 2nd flight cannot fly. rear motor not enough power/speed. battery fully charged. 
1 chip ia too hot.
mndarat dengan slamet tpi sayank lama hampir 9 hari trus sdikit kendala di bagian remot buat batre ada yang berkarat tpi normal .  ok tanks buat kdepanya lancar teruss..

super mantap.
kira in ada kameranyah.  ehhhh cuma lampu.
tapi mantap lah dan seruuuuuuu... adx kecil sangat suka.
Barang nya ga sesuai di gambar, ga ada kamera , saya sangat kecewa
dron nya imut bgt.lucu.maaf baru kasih ulasan

drone sesuai.tpi masalah kamera nya ga ad bohongin aja cuma hnya lampu bukan kamera.utk drone ok kamera no good.sangat kecewa bnget.drone nya ga bs terbang bs nya mundur gmn ni lazada baru kli ini produk nya jelek.klo bs minta ganti bs lazada
